Package com.googlecode.gwtmvc.client

Core package

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IModelListener<D> Model listener.
IView<D> The view is the graphical part of the application, get datas from model use controler to action on the system.
Maskable Allow to 'mask' an element during a loading action.
ModelForView<D> ModelForView allows view to call getValue and only getValue on a model.
 

Class Summary
BrowserEvent Event sent by the browser to signal a new URL or historyToken.
Controller The controller acts as a coordinator.
Event<V,A extends Enum> Deprecated. use MvcEvent instead
Masker Deprecated. Use StyleMasker and VisibleMasker instead
Model<T> Represent a data (or a collection of data) on the client side.
MvcEntryPoint Implements GWT entry point.
MvcEvent<V> Represents an event on the gui.
View<T,W extends Widget> The view is the graphical part of the application, get datas from model use controler to action on the system.
